attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: parliment called into recess, then an enquiry in to all expenses made by mps since 1979  (when thatcher changed the rules making it easy for mps to steal....sorry claim expenses with impunity). then a public televised hearing so that mps can moraly justify all the mony they have stolen to the people who employ the british public...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
